---
title: "ShinyStan Estimate Report"
output: pdf_document
params:
  intervalsPlot: NA
  areasPlot: NA
  scatterPlot: NA
  densityPlot: NA

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, eval = !is.null(params$intervalsPlot$intervalsPlot)}
print(params$intervalsPlot$intervalsPlot$plot)
shiny::HTML(params$intervalsPlot$intervalsPlot$caption)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, eval = !is.null(params$areasPlot$areasPlot)}
print(params$areasPlot$areasPlot$plot)
shiny::HTML(params$areasPlot$areasPlot$caption)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, eval = !is.null(params$scatterPlot$scatterPlot)}
print(params$scatterPlot$scatterPlot$plot)
shiny::HTML(params$scatterPlot$scatterPlot$caption)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, eval = !is.null(params$densityPlot$densityPlot)}
print(params$densityPlot$densityPlot$plot)
shiny::HTML(params$densityPlot$densityPlot$caption)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, eval = !is.null(params$histogramPlot$histogramPlot)}
suppressMessages(print(params$histogramPlot$histogramPlot$plot))
shiny::HTML(params$histogramPlot$histogramPlot$caption)
```
